subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James had a triple-double with 26 points, 11 rebounds and 13 assists to win his first N.B.A. championship as the Heat beat the Thunder in Game 5.
snippet: LeBron James had a triple-double with 26 points, 11 rebounds and 13 assists to win his first N.B.A. championship as the Heat beat the Thunder in Game 5.
